RecipeDef.label: Smith Buckler
RecipeDef.description: A shield made from hard materials able to deflect most types of attack. Wears out with use.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Medieval Shield
RecipeDef.description: A shield made from metallic and able to deflect most types of attack. Wears out with use.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Ballistic shield
RecipeDef.description: Ballistic shields are shields specifically designed to defeat handgun, long gun, and shotgun projectile threats, many will additionally defeat most types of stabbing or cutting-type weaponry, and hand-thrown or launched projectiles such as rocks and arrows. Pawn with higher combat skills will use ballistic shield more efficiently. Wears out with use.
